body.name: Dash Cam Hardwire Kit,Type-C Hard Wire Kit,USB C Hard Wire Kit Fuse for Dashcam, Plozoe 12V-24V to 5V Car Dash Camera Charger Power Cord, Gift 4 Fuse Tap Cable and Installation Tool（11.5ft）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 13 mins
features: Upgraded the 2nd Generation Dash Cam Hardwire Kit-You will get 1 x USB C USB hardwire kit,1 x installing crowbar,4 x fuse tap cable,dash cam hardwire with the most popular fuse types will meet the applications for most car models

24 Hours Surveillance -The vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off.If the voltage of your car battery drops to 11.6V or 23.5V, the regulator will cut off the power,which leaves you with enough power to start your car

High Secure Standards-The USB C hardwire kit with built-in precise switching power supply module can transform 12V(24V) to 5V. The built-in safeguards protect your devices against excessive current, overheating

Wide Compatibility-This USB C usb cable hardwire kit is suitable for most car models(Voltage between 12-24V). Our usb hardwire kit works for almost all car USB C device, such as REDTIGER F7N/T27/T700,VIOFO A229,Rove R3,AZDOME M560,Pelsee P12/P10 Pro,Vantrue N4 and N2S, X4S, E1, E2,S2,T3 dash cam,WOLFBOX i07/G900/G850/G840S G840H mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc.
Easy Installation-Simple hidden wiring keeps the car neat and tidy and releases the cigarette lighter for connecting to more devices. TIPS: Please read the quick guide carefully before use
body.description: Safety Notes Pertorm the installation with the ignition in the OFF position. Do not strip any live wires. Correct electnical polarity and grounding is required for safe and proper installation. Only connect to a negative ground DC supply circuit. Not for installation to positive ground circuits. If you don't have experience on installing the hardwire kits for the dash cam, please ask professional for help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded the 2nd Generation Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Type-C USB This Type C USB port converter hardwire kit. Perfect for 24/7 Parking Surveillance.Low voltage protection protects against battery dying.Plozoe Dash cam hardwire kit works for almost all car USB C device, such as dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc.

Safety Notes Pertorm the installation with the ignition in the OFF position. Do not strip any live wires. Correct electnical polarity and grounding is required for safe and proper installation. Only connect to a negative ground DC supply circuit. Not for installation to positive ground circuits. If you don't have experience on installing the hardwire kits for the dash cam, please ask professional for help. Technical Details Connector: USB-C Connector Input Voltage: DC 12V-24V Output Voltage: 5V Output Current: 2A Working Temperature:-40~ 160 Degree F Cable Length: 11.5ft/3.5m Low Voltage Protection: 11.6V for 12V vehicle; 23.5V for 24V vehicle.

The main function Low Voltage Protection Set 6 high-precision resistors,Dual power-off protection chip, intelligent low-voltage protection device can read the battery voltage more accurately, When your car's voltage is lower than 11.7V or 11.6V, it will automatically turn off the power. Protect your car battery more effectively. 24 Hours Parking Surveillance The vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off. Compatible 12 – 24V Vehicles This hardwire kit accepts voltage from any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, works perfect for car, truck, bus, suvs, or big rig for continuous power. Compatible 12 – 24V Vehicles 4.3mm transmission line, high-quality copper core conductor, the dashcam hardware kit is faster and safer to charge

Four Types of Fuses Adapters for Almost All Cars Comes with Low-profile mini fuse, Mini fuse, Micro 2 fuse, ATO (regular) fuse adapters for you to use whatever your vehicles fuse box requires. Besides, with the seal wire connectors that will be easy for you to connect, firm connection and prevent short circuit. Compatible 12 – 24V Vehicles This hardwire kit accepts voltage from any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, works perfect for car, truck, bus, suvs, or big rig for continuous power. Upgraded the 2nd Generation Dash Cam Hardwire Kit An automatic matching device is set at the Type-C USB connector to make the compatibility range wider, such as REDTIGER VIOFO AZDOME WOLFBOX Pelsee Vantrue Vava Garmin Dash cam, etc. Compatible With Most Of The Car Dash Cam With Type C USB Input This mirror dash cam hardwire kit is applied to almost all car Typc C USB device (Voltage Between 12-30V), Convert the voltage from 12v to 5v,such as Vantrue N4 and N2S, X4S, T3,Cobra C201 dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc, it match most of the car installation.

Installation steps Find the Correct Fuse Slot Open the fuse box, find the correct fuse slot for your hardwire kit. If you need to find an ignition switched fuse, put the key in the vehicle, find the fuse which is not lit up while the car is off, and test it by turning the car on to see if it lights up. If your kit requires constant power, turn off the car and remove the key to see which fuse slots stays lit on. Connect the Red Wire Once you've determined which fuse slots you need to use for your hardwiring kit you can crimp the red wire of your hardwire kit onto the Add-A-Fuse. Gently remove the fuse you identified. Install the fuse you just removed into the installation kit add-a-fuse circuit. Plug the add-a-circuit into the fuse box in the correct orientation. Ground the Hardwiring Kit Slip the black wire (which is in the shape of a C) under a metal bolt or screw in your vehicle (this is the ground wire). Check that it is not attached onto plastic parts. You will typically need a socket wrench to loosen the nut or bolt that you choose to ground with. To attach the grounding terminal, loosen the nut or bolt enough to slip it in and tighten it back up afterwards. DUAL SLOT FUSE HOLDER It provides one fuse holder to protect original circuit and provides a lead with the second fuse holder for new circuit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dash Cam Rolling 24/7 with Plozoe's Ultimate Hardwire Kit - Power, Protection, and Peace of Mind!
reviews.reviewText: A Game-Changer for Dash Cam Users - Plozoe's Hardwire Kit Delivers Uninterrupted Security!As someone who's always on the road, I've found the Plozoe Dash Cam Hardwire Kit to be an absolute lifesaver. This kit is like the Swiss Army knife of power solutions for dash cams – versatile, reliable, and packed with features.Ease of Installation:First off, the installation process was a breeze. The included crowbar and fuse tap cables made it feel like I was playing a spy in a high-tech movie – except I was just neatly tucking wires into my car. No more messy cables, and my cigarette lighter is finally free for other gadgets!24/7 Surveillance Perfection:This kit means business when it talks about 24-hour surveillance. Hooked up to my car's battery, it keeps my dash cam (a Rove R3, in my case) powered even when the car is off. What’s more comforting than knowing your car is under watchful eyes even as you sleep?Safety Features Galore:The built-in safeguards against current overload and overheating give me peace of mind. Plus, the automatic cut-off at low battery voltages ensures I'm never stranded with a dead car battery. This kit doesn't just power my dash cam; it protects my car's battery too.Universal Compatibility:I was impressed by its wide compatibility. It works seamlessly with a variety of dash cams, GPS devices, and even radar detectors. It's like the universal donor of power supplies!The Verdict:The Plozoe Dash Cam Hardwire Kit is more than just an accessory; it's a necessity for anyone serious about their vehicle's security. With its easy installation, robust safety features, and universal compatibility, it's not just a purchase but an investment in your peace of mind. My car feels incomplete without it now!Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐"An essential upgrade for any dash cam user – Plozoe's got your back, 24/7!"

reviews.reviewText: Initial kit stopped working fuses are good, but camera was not working. When I used cigarettes lighter for a plug than it works. Bought this kit 6 months ago. Soon after I posted initial review I was contacted by seller and they have send me replacement. Great customer service A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I found this as the best one so far, Same as description and pictures. Excellent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No Low side Voltage.
reviews.reviewText: After waiting two days for my dashcam hardwire kit to arrive I was very disappointed when I opened the bag to find the product was not in a box but a plastic bag. After opening the bag I noticed the ground lug was bent and it made me think that this was a returned item. I then started to install the unit taking my time to make sure it will look like a professional install. After several checks and rechecks, I found the 12 to 5 volt transformer was faulty. I had to cut the low side cable in order to check the transformer but that was the reason I did not have voltage on the low side (5V). I have reordered the same unit and I will be returning the faulty one. You would think that if it was a return item, they would test it before shipping it out again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dash Cam Hardwire Kit,Type-C Works great and fast shipping
reviews.reviewText: fast shipping, thank you, works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This harness killed my battery over night
reviews.reviewText: First my background... I was a electrical master tech for GM for over 20 years and still employed as an auto tech. This product is suppose to be wired live so that if motion detection would go off it would start recording. What it did do was kill my battery. Checked my battery with digital battery tester we use at work that does print outs. Battery tested good and it should since it's only 8 months old. Not impressed at all with this product. I did move the power source to a different fuse just to try other options buy again... no crank no start the next morning. Would not recomend

reviews.reviewTitle: Does the Job for a Dashcam Hard-Wire
reviews.reviewText: If your dashcam only requires ground and power, this will do the job, but if your dashcam also has a parking monitor feature, this does not have a third power accessory lead need by this feature as the Focuway T6 Dashcam requires.
Comes with all thats needed for camera installation and enough cable length for my jeep Jk rear camera mounted outside the car .

reviews.reviewerName: Works great! Very Happy with it!
reviews.reviewText: Use as a dash cam in my car
